titleNullable: wild animal detection and alerting system
descriptionNullable:
### Context

There's a story behind every dataset and here's your opportunity to share yours.


### Content

Wildlife monitoring and analysis are an active research field since last many decades. In this paper, we focus on wildlife monitoring and analysis through animal detection from natural scenes acquired by camera-trap networks.
